net.objectzoo.ebc.builder

Class NewFlowConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.objectzoo.ebc.builder.NewFlowConnector

  • public final class NewFlowConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains some static methods used to continue a DSL sentence with a new flow of EBCs
    Author:
    tilmann

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> SendsResultConnector<T> await(net.objectzoo.events.Event<T> event)
      Waits for the given Event and then continues with whatever is attached to the returned SendsResultConnector.
      SendsSignalConnector await(net.objectzoo.events.Event0 event)
      Waits for the given Event0 and then continues with whatever is attached to the returned SendsSignalConnector.
      <T> SendsResultConnector<T> await(SendsResult<T> flow)
      Waits for the result event of the given SendsResult and then continues with whatever is attached to the returned SendsResultConnector.
      SendsSignalConnector await(SendsSignal flow)
      Waits for the signal event of the given SendsSignal and then continues with whatever is attached to the returned SendsSignalConnector.
